p:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ FI=\frac{\mathrm{Nc}}{\mathrm{Nt}}x100 $$\end{document}
FI =
Nc Nt
x 100
(Nc = number of informants in a given category who cited the species; Nt = total number of informants in all categories who cited the same species).
